title: Bloomberg Markets: Verizon Unlimited Plans Wins Back Users
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Verizon Unlimited Plans Wins Back Users
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Scott Moritz Telecom Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Verizon Communications Inc. shares jumped the most in eight years on Thursday after the phone company returned full-force to wireless subscriber growth with a blistering 614,000 customer additions in the second quarter.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
